Class MoneyHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • MoneyHandler

  • public class MoneyHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    MoneyHandler.java - Carries out all money related tasks of Vending Machine through interaction with MoneyStack class.
    Version:
    10/1/15
    Author:
    Justin Watts

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void collectMoney()
      Allows administrator of Vending Machine to collect all inserted money to a baseline amount used for change.
      double makeChange(double totalEntered, double cost)
      Makes change based on amount of money entered and cost of selected product.
      void setBaseMoney()
      Sets the baseline amount of money available in the Vending Machine upon startup.
      void storeCoins(int quarters, int dimes, int nickels)
      Stores the inserted coins from a transaction in money stacks.

    • Method Detail

      • collectMoney

        public void collectMoney()
        Allows administrator of Vending Machine to collect all inserted money to a baseline amount used for change.

      • setBaseMoney

        public void setBaseMoney()
        Sets the baseline amount of money available in the Vending Machine upon startup.

      • makeChange

        public double makeChange(double totalEntered,
                         double cost)
        Makes change based on amount of money entered and cost of selected product.
        Parameters:
        totalEntered - total money entered by user
        cost - cost of product selected by user
        Returns:
        total amount of change being given

      • storeCoins

        public void storeCoins(int quarters,
                       int dimes,
                       int nickels)
        Stores the inserted coins from a transaction in money stacks.
        Parameters:
        quarters - amount of quarters entered
        dimes - amount of dimes entered
        nickels - amount of nickels entered
